itemDescription: Fighter pilot in the Royal Air Force (1920-2019)

wikipedia_page.main: Wing Commander John Francis Durham "Tim" Elkington (23 December 1920 – 1 February 2019) was a British Royal Air Force (RAF) fighter pilot who flew during the Battle of Britain, and was one of the last surviving aircrew known as "The Few".

response: * December 23 – Tim Elkington, English Royal Air Force pilot (d. 2019)
